SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

atan2.model
Interface Controller

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerAdaptor
public interface Controller

Interface that has to be implemented in order to control players. Whenever a see command arrives from the sserver preInfo() is invoked then the info*() methods are called according to what kind of objects are currently seen or what other commands were received from the sserver. At last postInfo() is called. All objects are relative to the current side of the controlled player.
In order to implement this interface the ControllerAdaptor class should be used.

See Also:
ControllerAdaptor

Method Detail

preInfo

void preInfo()
Called prior to all sensory input notification methods as info*().

ATTENTION!!
Hear messages are handled asynchronously and therefore no preInfo is called prior to hear notifications!!

postInfo

void postInfo()
Called after all sensory input notification methods (info*()) were called.

ATTENTION!!
Hear messages are handled asynchronously and therefore no postInfo is called after hear notifications!!

getPlayer

Player getPlayer()
Gets the player controlled by this controller.

Returns:
Controlled player.

setPlayer

void setPlayer(Player c)
Sets the player to be controlled by this controller.

Parameters:
c - Player to be controlled.

isGoalie

boolean isGoalie()
Checks whether the controlled player has goalie state.

Returns:
True if controlled player is a goalie, false otherwise.
